hero.headline: Full stack developer.
hero.tagline: I create serious projects without taking myself too seriously.
hero.languages: I'm a <bold>TypeScript/JavaScript full-stack</bold> developer. I've been using <bold>React Native since 2016</bold> as my main expertise, and I also work with Node.js, Python, Golang, Java, Kotlin, C++, C#, Objective-C, Swift, and C.

projects.title: A few things I've worked on
projects.intro: Selection of technical work, side-projects and experiments..

salut-cheffe.title: Salut Cheffe
salut-cheffe.subtitle: Recipe site · Full-stack
salut-cheffe.description: French cooking recipe site for my sister, a cooking influencer. I built it with emphasis on SEO, accessibility and responsiveness.
features: Dashboard to add & manage recipes and categories

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.subtitle: Personal portfolio · React + Vite
portfolio.description: This very portfolio website showcasing my projects and work. Built with React, Vite, and TypeScript, featuring i18n support (English/French), responsive design, and deployed via GitHub Pages.
